Class CalculationOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gembox.spreadsheet.calculationengine.CalculationOptions

  • public final class CalculationOptions
extends Object
    Class represents various calculation engine options.

    • Method Detail

      • getMaximumChange

        public double getMaximumChange()
        Gets the maximum calculation change.

        This method defines the maximum value change in circular reference iterations after which the calculation process is stopped.

        Returns:
        The maximum calculation change.

      • getMaximumIterations

        public int getMaximumIterations()
        Gets the maximum calculation iterations.

        This method defines the maximum number of formula recalculations for a circular reference.

        Returns:
        The maximum calculation iterations.

      • isEnableIterativeCalculation

        public boolean isEnableIterativeCalculation()
        Gets a value indicating whether iterative calculation is enabled.

        A circular reference is when a formula refers to itself directly or indirectly.

        Returns:
        true if iterative calculation is enabled; otherwise, false.

      • setEnableIterativeCalculation

        public void setEnableIterativeCalculation(boolean enableIterativeCalculation)
        Sets a value indicating whether iterative calculation is enabled.

        A circular reference is when a formula refers to itself directly or indirectly. Setting to true will allow circular references in cell formulas; otherwise a SpreadsheetParserException will be thrown for every circular reference in the calculation process.

        Parameters:
        enableIterativeCalculation - true to enable iterative calculation; otherwise, false.

      • setMaximumChange

        public void setMaximumChange(double value)
        Sets the maximum calculation change.

        This method defines the maximum value change in circular reference iterations after which the calculation process is stopped.

        Parameters:
        value - The maximum calculation change.

      • setMaximumIterations

        public void setMaximumIterations(int value)
        Sets the maximum calculation iterations.

        This method defines the maximum number of formula recalculations for a circular reference.

        Parameters:
        value - The maximum calculation iterations.
